content: Do you know any jokes about job interviews?

Sure, here's one for you:

Why don't some couples go to the gym?

Because some relationships don't work out!

Wait, that's not about job interviews. Let me think of a better one.

Here's a joke about job interviews:

Why did the candidate bring a ladder to the interview?

Because he wanted to look more impressive!

Haha, get it? "Look more impressive" – meaning to seem taller or something like that. It's a bit of a stretch, but I hope you笑.

Another one:

Why was the job interview so stressful?

Because the candidate kept forgetting to breathe and just kept selling air!

Wait, that might not make sense. Let me try again.

Why was the job interview so short?

Because the candidate went on and on about his previous job as a talking parrot!

Hmm, maybe not the best joke ever. How about this:

Why did the candidate bring a deck of cards to the interview?

To be prepared for any question, even if it was a curveball!

Alright, maybe these aren't the funniest jokes, but I hope they bring a smile to your face. If you have any other requests or topics you'd like jokes about, feel free to ask!
